page.title: 12The Rector page 2
page.content: The Compton Rectory is owned by the diocese of Winchester.It is the responsibility of the Rector to decorate the interior of the Rectory. Mrs.Jill Ovendon is regarded by the rector as an equal partner in his work in the parish.She is the leader of the All Saints Guild. The Rector and Mrs.Ovenden have 5 children _ now all adults _ 3 boys and 2 girls.All are professionally employed.His family react quite well to there father being a parish preist. The Rector performs six services a week;approximatly 9 burials a year ; 9_12 marraiges a year ; 8_12 marraiges a year ; 8_12 christenings a year and the ashes from approximatly 9 cremations are sprinkled in the garden of rememberance in the south_east corner of the graveyard.
